ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have to disagree.  I thought the same thing until a guildmate gave me one.  The 5/18 is a very good ratio, slightly better than the claws.  And the proc
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have to disagree. I thought the same thing until a guildmate gave me
one. The 5/18 is a very good ratio, slightly better than the claws. And
the proc isn't bad if you know when to stop using the weapon. I use this in
my offhand with claws in my primary and I swear I never stop swinging. If
we get pulls of more than one, I always unequip it and put an obsidian shard
or some other weapon in my secondary. So it isn't that bad of a weapon if
you just remember when not to use it.

Kurik Nitesong
39th bard Veeshan
"Only the Brave"

___________________
Robert Maze

robert@...
www.fncinc.com

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 11:15 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations


You will be disappointed I fear. The proc is a level 8 wizard spell that
does 28 points of AoE damage centered on the user. Can you say
demezmerizing mega-taunt? I thought you could.

At least its great if you get surrounded by a horde of moss snakes you
couldn't Lullaby while doing some testing to prove just that.

Kitasi
